name: get_pregame_form
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool viperscore.
Tool description: ViperScore is the cheapest sports API for all hobby and business projects with over 25 endpoints, 20+ sports and 5100+ leagues! We serve comprehensive data blazing fast with a clear structure and a well thought out scheme. You get the best live results and fast information for every game and we constantly develop the API further and include more data.
API description: If you're a detail hunter this is the place for you! Get the information about the last games both teams accomplished.

gameid.description: The unique identifier of the game for which to fetch pregame form information.
